dublin_core.dcvalue: Since the International Agency for Research on Cancer recently classified radiofrequency electromagnetic fields such as those emanating from mobile and cordless phones as possibly carcinogenic to humans group 2B two additional reports relevant to the topic have been published Both articles were new updates of a Danish cohort on mobile phone subscribers and concern the possible association between assumed use of mobile phones and risk of brain tumors The aim of the present review is to reexamine all four publications on this cohort
Review of four publications on the Danish cohort study on mobile phone subscribers and risk of brain tumors.
